title: Kolkata
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Kolkata , from a wide variety of genres like Bengali, Bollywood, India, Indian and Pop.  Enjoy stations such as Radio BongOnet, Love Junction Internet Radio, Elite FM, All India Radio - AIR Bangla, Radio World View and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Gyan Vani Kolkata is a broadcast radio station in Kolkata, Bangla, India and part of the Gyan Vani Educational FM Radio Network from Indira Gandhi
radio_info.rest: National Open University (IGNOU) Electronic Media Production Centre in New Delhi, India. As a public service, Gyan Vani provides programming from various India-based educational institutions, such as NCERT, NIOS and State Open Universities, as well as from NGOs, government and semi-government organizations, UN agencies, and India government ministries such as Agriculture, Environment, Health, Women and Child Welfare.

radio_contacts.short: Gyan Vani Kolkata is a broadcast radio station in Kolkata, Bangla, India and part of the Gyan Vani Educational FM Radio Network from Indira Gandhi

radio_contact.address: Electronic Media Production Centre (EMPC), Maidan Garhi, New Delhi, India 110068
